typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ContactId as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		FullName as string,
		DateOfBirth as string,
		Gender as string,
		EMail as string,
		Telephone as string,
		PostCode as string,
		StreetAddress as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		CreatedOn as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CantactAIAD
CantactAIAD select(mapColumn(
		ContactId,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		FullName,
		DateOfBirth,
		Gender,
		EMail,
		Telephone,
		PostCode,
		StreetAddress,
		City,
		State,
		Country,
		CreatedOn
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectcol
